products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, cosmic white - venetian blind the matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusiv
products.productdescription: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect.Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

products.title: Cotswold, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, ghost white - venetian blind light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you ca
products.productdescription: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use.For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content! Go for glossy silver fittings for a contemporary feel.

products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, cosmic white gloss - venetian blind cosmic indeed, the cotswold's cosmic white gloss is a magically glossy venetian blind, where thick, tilting slats are painted in a deluxe white sheen. All components, including a headrail, bottom rail, and aco
products.productdescription: Cosmic indeed, the cotswold's cosmic white gloss is a magically glossy venetian blind, where thick, tilting slats are painted in a deluxe white sheen. All components, including a headrail, bottom rail, and acorns, are finished to a high standard, and are provided in coordinating tones.Bring a bold, vivacious shade of tropical purple to life by painting a feature wall and placing the cosmic white gloss against it. Plump for light wooden floors and white and wooden furniture, using matching purple for cushions, throws, and ornaments.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, cosmic white - venetian blind generate an enchanting window display with the cotswold deluxe in cosmic white, hosting polished, authentic basswood. This elegant arrangement of superior louvres, accompanied by quality components, creates a
products.productdescription: Generate an enchanting window display with the cotswold deluxe in cosmic white, hosting polished, authentic basswood. This elegant arrangement of superior louvres, accompanied by quality components, creates a contemporary, venetian blind that is both practical and easy to install. For an attractive and soothing dcor scheme, display the cosmic white in the bathroom, amongst gleaming white tiles and elegant ceramics. Add colour and creativity by forming a relaxed palette of subtle lilac hues, adding plush, lavender bath towels and charming, mauve-inspired wall art.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, ghost white - venetian blind featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven la
products.productdescription: Featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven ladder tapes, finish the look off neatly and with style.Set the ghost white against a country floral wallpaper for a rural look in either a contemporary or period property. Pick your favourite colour or two from the paper and use them to accent the room, in the form of throws, cushions, and ornaments.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, cosmic white gloss - venetian blind bring a plush white sheen into your home by choosing the cosmic white gloss, a shiny painted venetian blind from the cotswold deluxe range. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end feat
products.productdescription: Bring a plush white sheen into your home by choosing the cosmic white gloss, a shiny painted venetian blind from the cotswold deluxe range. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end features of a designer blind, including coordinating linen ladder tapes and a top quality finish.For an ultra-modern and incredibly striking look in a dining room, go all white! Furnish the room from top to bottom in white, from walls to flooring to furniture, and the cosmic white gloss will fit right in. Add splashes of colour with the occasional wall painting or plant.
